* :doc:`Distributions <utils/distributions>`: Contains the tools for distributions of stochastic variables.
* :doc:`Input Reformation <utils/input_reformat>`: Get the input list for representations and policies.
* :doc:`Layers <utils/layers>`: Create a block of MLP, CNN, or RNN layer.
* :doc:`Operations <utils/operations>`: Contains some basic tools.
* :doc:`Value Norm <utils/value_norm>`: Normalize the values for actor-critic based algorithms.
